## KumoStoreListenerParams interface

Parameters passed to [KumoStore](./lib-base.kumostore.md) listeners.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface KumoStoreListenerParams<T = unknown> 
```

## Remarks

Use the [subscribe()](./lib-base.kumostore.subscribe.md) function to register a listener.

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [newState](./lib-base.kumostorelistenerparams.newstate.md) |  | [KumoStoreState](./lib-base.kumostorestate.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt; | The entire previous state. |
|  [oldState](./lib-base.kumostorelistenerparams.oldstate.md) |  | [KumoStoreState](./lib-base.kumostorestate.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt; | The entire new state. |
